EmailTemplate.name: Removing User
EmailTemplate.subject: React News Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.SuppliedName},
XXX has been removed from React News Subscription.
If you need any additional assistance, please let us know.
Best regards, React News Client Operations requests@reactnews.com
